summary: A test suite that validates the Splinter model’s functionality, covering configuration integrity, pretraining behavior, question‑answering capability, handling of input embeddings, loading from pretrained checkpoints, support for diverse embedding types, and correct operation under multi‑GPU data‑parallel execution.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the Splinter model across core tasks and deployment environments, reducing risk and supporting reliable AI product delivery.
